level.heading: Local business enterprises with principal offices located in an enterprise zone.
level.text: A local business enterprise shall be eligible for certification as a local business enterprise with principal offices located in an enterprise zone if its principal offices are located in an enterprise zone as defined by ยง 2- 218.02.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2337 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-33, see notes following ยง 2-218.01.
